entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 2:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %

Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
